name: Classic Survival Horror [with Co-op]
description:
Return to the Classic Survival Horror roots with a twist of Couch Co-op!

DISCLAIMER: The current version is strictly for feedback about player movement.  The game supports gamepads, Xbox controls, and Mouse/Keyboard.

FEEDBACK:

If you do try out this project, I would greatly appreciate any type of feedback about the following:

1. How the player movement feels?

2. What control schemes did you try (keyboard? Gamepad (what type/brand))?

3. Did you try the Co-op function (Just press a Button/Key on another device)?

4. Are the Classic controls Satisfying, suggestions?

5. Are the Modern controls Satisfying, suggestion?

CONTROLS:

Keyboard:

Movement: AWSD or Arrow Keys

Run: Hold down either SHIFT key

Quick Turn: Hold back + Shift

Quit Game: keyboard ESCAPE key

GamePad/Xbox Controller [Classic Gameplay]:

Movement: Dpad

Run: Hold down the SOUTH face button. (Xbox = A, PS4/5 = X, ect..)

Quick Turn: Hold back + press RUN button

Quit Game: keyboard ESCAPE key, gamepad START/MENU/OPTIONS button 

GamePad/Xbox Controller [Modern Gameplay]:

Movement: Left Stick

Run: Player speed is dependent on how far the left stick is pushed

Quick Turn: Turning is immediate via left stick direction

Quit Game: keyboard ESCAPE key, gamepad START/MENU/OPTIONS button
